data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Fabtech Technologies Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from October 07 2025 the equity shares of Fabtech Technologies Ltd (Scrip Code: 544558) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251006-64 dated October 06 2025.
